latino_east_african_gravity_models:avoca.long_name: Avocado access score (Empirical cumulative density function)
latino_east_african_gravity_models:avoca.short_description: Avocado access score by item availability using an empirical cumulative density function
latino_east_african_gravity_models:avoca.long_description: Avocado access score by item availability using an empirical cumulative density function. Item availbility determined by webscraping grocery retailer with an online presence. Avocado is defined as a Latino staple food by The Food Group
latino_east_african_gravity_models:avoca.statement: The avocado access score in {features.name} is {value}.
